Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka and India have played 1 match in the series, with Dunith Wellalage being the Man of the Match in the first game.
Dunith Wellalage scored the highest fantasy points for Sri Lanka with 158 match fantasy points while Axar Patel topped the fantasy points leaderboard for India with 103 match fantasy points.
The pitch at the R. Premadasa Stadium, Colombo is a balanced pitch with an average 1st innings score of 218 runs in the last 20 matches.
Light rain is forecasted which may affect playing conditions.
In the 169 matches played between these 2 teams, India Batters have earned the most fantasy points for their team, while Bowlers have earned the most fantasy points for Sri Lanka.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Temperature is expected to be around 28.93 °C with 74% humidity and winds at a speed of 6.12 m/s.
The venue is suited for both Pacers and Spinners alike.
